DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study assess safety efficacy repeat subcutaneous ( SC ) injection KRN23 adult subject X-Linked Hypophosphatemia ( XLH ) . A Bone Substudy evaluate effect single-blind KRN23 versus Placebo bone mineral density bone quality .
DOC.brief_title: A Repeated Study KRN23 Adults With X-Linked Hypophosphatemia
